steps.119: Slice-Slice one tomato into about 1/2 inch thick slices
steps.120: Place-Place the thick slices of tomatoes on a platter, ensuring they only make a single layer
steps.121: Add-Add a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil, about 1 tablespoon, over the entire platter
steps.122: dry-gently dry it with a paper/tea towel
steps.123: Season-Season the tomato slices with salt
steps.124: Sprinkle-Sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top of the tomato throughout the platter
steps.126: Season-Season platter with 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
